channel.title: Items on correct slot
channel.description:
Ok guys, I just started to learn java. I always wanted to code my own server, so after reading thread in here I downloaded a [PI] server & client. It was 90% clean base.
I added a bit of coding to my server.
Now when I wear morrigance, not only it doesn't have the correct bonuses, the coif goes on to the shield slot.
I saw a thread explains the slot problem but it was for delta, and I tried it, it didn't work.
Can anyone help me?

item.title: Items on correct slot
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

ItemAssistant.java in the wearItem method.

item.cfg for item bonuses.

Read full topic
